622090.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Tyranny 2 (Token Pack)
622090.description:
Ddraig Goch's Tyranny Pack 2

This product depicts 53 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. The pack consists of both good and evil forces. Dragonborn, both male and female, Kobolds, Acolytes, both male and female. Guards, Dragonclaws, Guard Drakes, Ambush Drakes, Cultists, both male and female, prisoners, both male and female. And as a bonus 3 tokens from Pack 1.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Male Acolyte
  • 3 Dragonclaws
  • 2 Dwarf Male cultists
  • Female Priestess
  • 3 Female Prisoners
  • Govenor
  • Half-Orc Guard
  • 4 Female Human Cultists
  • 3 Male Human Cultists
  • Injured Monk
  • Kobold Crawling
  • 2 Kobolds Sitting
  • Kobold Sleeping
  • 3 Kobolds with Daggers
  • 3 Kobolds with Slings
  • 5 Male Human Guards
  • 5 Male Prisoners
  • 4 Ambush Drakes
  • 2 Female Dragonborn Leaders
  • Female Head Cleric
  • 2 Guard Drakes
  • 2 Half-Elf Monks
  • Male Dragonborn Champion
  • Prisoners all together
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
